Posts.Content: craftd wrote: Hello, Last year, I had core needle biopsy to determine that the lump in my breast was a fibroadenoma. The lump was not removed, so I'm wondering if it is expected for my screening mammogram to return as "abnormal." Is anyone else in this same situation that can speak to this? Thanks! Log in to post a reply
